features.title: A place where your ideas will be shaped to their best
features.description:
CTC is a community of innovators, founders, change-makers, stakeholders & impact investors, all within climate tech industry in the Benelux region.

How CTC can help you? We organize community get-togethers & knowledge sharing activities; we host events ranging from intimate, exclusive meetups to large-scale conferences. Our services includes AI-powered and manual investor-founder matchmaking, access to a curated talent pool & consortia creation.

Against a backdrop of digital & AI age, a community with a sense of connection is poised to spread new ideas & drive real-world change.
